channel.title: Please Help! URGENT!
channel.description:
Well I have probably worst glitch I can imagine in my server.... EVERYONE LOGS IN AS MOD/ADMIN/OR CO! I am so terrified because they can all IP ban each other and I can't delete IP bans "Safely" Because I might delete the wrong IP, Can anyone please help me? It was working fine then just out of random people start logging in as Co's It was working fine yesterday... I have a feelin it has something to do with Player or PlayerHandler files... Please help...
Thanks in Advance....
~~~Skullator~~~
P.S Why am I a Junior member?? Did a backup happen? Because It says I got 4 posts even though I 'Had' Like 120!

item.title: Please Help! URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Well I have probably worst glitch I can imagine in my server… EVERYONE LOGS IN AS MOD/ADMIN/OR CO! I am so terrified because they can all IP ban each other and I can’t delete IP bans “Safely” Because I might delete the wrong IP, Can anyone please help me? It was working fine then just out of random people start logging in as Co’s It was working fine yesterday… I have a feelin it has something to do with Player or PlayerHandler files… Please help…
